parameters: That's it! That's my Diary, thank you.
Here, as a reward for returning it, I offer you a page of it,
my father told me it held magical powers in just the paper...
Perhaps you can retrieve  some other items for me, if you would.
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my
fahter's lance. Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with
the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
Have you found my diary yet?
Have you come back to help me?
Please, I'm also missing my mother's dress, and my
fahter's lance. Th-they were both stolen, I suspect it was the one with
the blue hair. He's a wretched thief!
Oh, well thank you for returning my diary.
Have you found the items yet?
Yes! You found my mother's dress.
Oh, let me know when you find it...
I seemed to have also lost my father's old weapon, his trusty lance.
Could you bring it to me?
Thank you! Now everything is nearly perfect...
Let me know when you've found it... I know I dropped it somewhere...
There's just one more item you must retrieve for me, but it is still
within my former home.. you must go and confront my father, and
Please, hurry back with the Chalice!
Just one last thing left to do!
With that you can negate your foes abilities, I thank you for
Would you like to rest for a while?
Would you like to rest for a while?
